document.full_text: enrique arancibia clavel, who was convicted in 1974 of organizing the assassination of a leading critic of gen. augusto pinochet, was found in his apartment with multiple stab wounds.
document.title: former agent for pinochet is found slain in argentina
lines_and_colors: enrique arancibia clavel, who was convicted in 1974 of organizing the assassination of a leading critic of gen. augusto pinochet, was found in his apartment with multiple stab wounds.
